title: Brazil Confronts a Momentous Bolsonaro vs. Lula Election
description: Brazilians head to the polls on Sunday in an election between two political heavyweights that could have global repercussions.
dc:creator: Jack Nicas

media:content.media:credit: Dado Galdieri for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Brazil’s far-right president, Jair Bolsonaro, faces a tough challenge from a former president, Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, who vows to return to a leftist track.
